tool_description: Airport codes (IATA, ICAO), location, and local time
name: Airports
title: Airports

api_list.name: Get airport by IATA code
api_list.description: Get airport by IATA code. For example, Singapore airport has IATA code "SIN".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airports15.p.rapidapi.com/airports/iata/SIN"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports15.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://airports15.p.rapidapi.com/airports/iata/{iata_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports15.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get airport by ICAO code
api_list.description: Get airport by ICAO code. For example, Singapore airport has ICAO code "WSSS".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airports15.p.rapidapi.com/airports/icao/WSSS"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports15.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://airports15.p.rapidapi.com/airports/icao/{icao_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airports15.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Query airports by name
api_list.description: Query airports by name. Paging and sorting supported.

optional_parameters.name: sorted_by
optional_parameters.description: Sorted by one of {name, icao, iata}. Append ':reversed' for reversed order. For example, 'name:reversed'

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: Number of results per page. Max  20
